explains: adj. 钝的，不锋利的；直言不讳的，说话生硬的
v. 减弱；使不锋利，使变钝

sentences.en: The edge is as blunt as an old butter knife.
sentences.cn: 刃钝得跟一把老黄油刀一样。

sentences.en: The police said he had been hit with a blunt instrument.
sentences.cn: 警方说他遭到了钝器袭击。

sentences.en: One of them had been struck 13 times over the head with a blunt object.
sentences.cn: 他们其中一人的头部被钝器砸了13下。
